title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 505.24 - Blood, plasma or related products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 505.24 - Blood, plasma or related products

State Regulations
(a) The cost of blood, plasma or related
products provided by a hospital or by a certified independent health facility
are not eligible for reimbursement if the costs of such blood products are
included in the financial statement used as the basis for determination of the
facility's medical assistance rate. (b) The cost of blood, plasma or related
products when not available without charge or when not provided for as in
subdivision (a) of this section, may be eligible for reimbursement if provided
on the written order of a physician. Notes

505.24

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
